message.body: Liz I miss you and I don't think you'll be coming into the city soon haha let me come to you!! Are you free this coming Tuesday or Thursday? I can drive to you and be there anytime 4pm and onwards !? I can bring dinner if you tell me dietary restrictions!
Lillian has been an eating machine - day and night- so I try to sleep when she sleeps. When her eating and sleeping schedule becomes a little more normal- we can figure something out. Hugs
Ok!! What's your address??? I'll mail you stuff at least lol
You're an amazing mom. That sounds so intense ❤️
